servinfo.title: DTC P0327 / P0328: Knock Sensor Circuit Low / High

servinfosub.title: DTC Detecting Condition and Trouble Area

entry.ptxt: DTC will be set when all of following conditions are detected for 0.5 seconds continuously.

item.ptxt: Voltage of knock sensor is less than 1.23 V
Voltage of knock sensor is 3.91 V or more

s1.ptxt: Connect scan tool to DLC with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch and clear DTC, pending DTC and freeze frame data by using scan tool.
Start engine and run it for 10 sec.
Check DTC by using scan tool.

attention3.ptxt: Before this trouble shooting is performed, read the precautions for DTC troubleshooting referring to Precautions For DTC Troubleshooting .

testgroup.question: Was “Engine and Emission Control System Check” performed?

action.ptxt: Go to Engine and Emission Control System Check .

test1.ptxt: Remove ECM from its bracket with ECM connectors connected.
Measure voltage between “C37-56” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground with engine running.

action.ptxt: Intermittent trouble. Check for intermittent referring to Intermittent and Poor Connection Inspection . If OK, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.

testgroup.title: Knock sensor circuit for open check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connector from knock sensor with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch, measure voltage between “WHT” wire of knock sensor connector and engine ground.

testgroup.question: Is voltage 4 – 6 V?

testgroup.title: Knock sensor circuit for open check

test1.ptxt: Turn ON ignition switch, measure voltage between “C37-56” terminal of ECM connector and engine ground

testgroup.question: Is voltage 4 – 6 V?

testgroup.title: Knock sensor circuit for short check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from ECM with ignition switch turned OFF.
Measure resistance between “C37-56” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground.

testgroup.question: Is resistance infinity?

paragroup.ptxt: “WHT” wire is shorted to ground circuit.
If wire is OK, substitute a known-good ECM and recheck.

testgroup.title: Knock sensor circuit for short check

test1.ptxt: Disconnect connectors from ECM with ignition switch turned OFF.
Turn ON ignition switch, measure voltage between “C37-56” terminal of ECM connector and vehicle body ground.

testgroup.question: Is voltage 0 V?

action.ptxt: “WHT” wire is shorted to other circuit.

testgroup.title: Knock sensor circuit for high resistance check

test1.ptxt: Turn OFF ignition switch, measure resistance between “C37-56” terminal of ECM connector and “RED” wire terminal of knock sensor harness connector.

testgroup.question: Is resistance below 5 Ω?
